mapper.select: select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate between #{thisWeekMonday} and #{thisWeekSunday}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate between #{firstDay4ThisMonth} and #{lastDay4ThisMonth}
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate = #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'
select count(id) from t_order where orderDate >= #{value} and orderStatus = '已到诊'

select s.name, count(o.id) setmeal_count ,count(o.id)/(select count(id) from t_order where orderDate between #{thisWeekMonday} and #{thisWeekSunday}) proportion from t_order o inner join t_setmeal s on s.id = o.setmeal_id where orderDate between #{thisWeekMonday} and #{thisWeekSunday} group by o.setmeal_id order by setmeal_count desc limit 0,4
